title: Refactor `Form` component to pull `formsData`
body:
## Describe your changes
As a follow-up to https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/pull/11278, move the `formsData` retrieval from `FormsContext` out of `Block.tsx` to reduce unnecessary rerenders

## Testing Plan
- Refactor: existing tests should pass

title: [WIP][AdvancedLayouts] Adds st.column(gap="none")
